name: Strategic Command Classic: WWII
description: The Matrix version is the Gold Edition of the Original Strategic Command: Blitzkrieg and Weapons and Warfare combined.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.5 GHZ Processor or Equivalent (Running the game in higher resolution requires more processing power.) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 8MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
